thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 15 of 2268
thread.title: Roger Abraham

author: Roger Abraham
title: Roger Abraham
text:
We had new Windows fitted in our bungalow and following a good experience 7 years ago ordered new blinds from same company .
We looked no further in choosing new blinds .
First time we self fitted white aluminium blinds all fitted without any issues.
This time we choose alabaster wooden blinds.
They were delivered very quickly arrived beautifully packed on day promised.
The blinds fitted perfectly all parts in the kits, overall a very pleasant experience.
